response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your unique needs. This product holds immense value for us at $1,500,000, reflecting its quality, innovation, and the resources invested into its development. Given its significance and the benefits it offers to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000.

This offer represents a significant saving of $150,000 compared to its original value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I understand the importance of making informed decisions and ensuring that investments align with your goals and aspirations. Therefore, I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you of a seamless transaction process, dedicated customer support, and the highest standards of service. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.

I look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this exceptional product into your life.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
